message: Can someone point me in the direction of a working Sprockets configuration? I'm putting together a boilerplate https://github.com/dfadler/mm-toky and am stumped.
No configuration should be necessary. Simply use the normal Sprockets require commands in you JS files. Something like: https://gist.github.com/1133015

Having changed the default javascript directory seems to be at the root of my issue

# Change the JS directory
set :js_dir, "library/javascripts"

Should I have added something else to the config to tell sprockets where the javascript is being stored?
Hmm, I think Sprockets is using the :js_dir variable before your config is parsed (and changes the variable). Can you file a bug?
